descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Nikola Jokic draws a double-team and swings a pretty lefty pass to Monte Morris for a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nikola Jokic makes a sweet dime) 2021/12/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nikola Jokic draws a double-team and swings a pretty lefty pass to Monte Morris for a 3-pointer.

videos.description: Darius Bazley draws contact, but it doesn't stop him from scoring a bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Darius Bazley fights off defender for and-1) 2021/12/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Darius Bazley gets bumped and scores a basket

videos.description: Kenrich Williams dives to the court for a steal, then lofts a pass forward to Tre Mann for a layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kenrich Williams makes a great defensive play for the steal) 2021/12/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kenrich Williams hits the deck, then sets up Tre Mann for a layup

videos.description: Nikola Jokic fools Isaiah Roby with a pump-fake and gets the basket to fall while drawing a foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nikola Jokic with the and-1 bucket) 2021/12/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic pump-fakes and scores an and-1

videos.description: Nikola Jokic shows off his terrific vision with an assist on Aaron Gordon's and-1 bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Aaron Gordon fights off defender for and-1) 2021/12/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic passes out of another double-team for Gordon's and-1

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander grabs the rebound, then takes it the other way himself for a basket and a foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Shai Gilgeous-Alexander gets the basket plus the foul) 2021/12/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: SGA storms through for an and-1 basket

videos.description: Derrick Favors sends a long pass out to Josh Giddey for the transition basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Derrick Favors shows off his vision with nice dime vs. Denver Nuggets) 2021/12/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Derrick Favors goes long to set up Josh Giddey for a layup

videos.description: Lu Dort misses his first 3-point attempt, but chases down the rebound and eventually gets set up for a trey that he sinks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luguentz Dort drills 3-pointer in from Oklahoma City Thunder vs. Denver Nuggets) 2021/12/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lu Dort rewarded for his hustle with a 3

videos.description: Lu Dort cuts off the Nuggets' 11-0 run with a 3-pointer in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luguentz Dort buries 3-point shot against Denver Nuggets) 2021/12/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lu Dort stops Nuggets' momentum with a 3

videos.description: This young fan is absolutely immersed in his cotton candy at the Thunder game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Young fan goes to town on cotton candy with two hands) 2021/12/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Young fan goes to town on cotton candy with two hands
